comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Date written on negative is 4/26/1913. Probably the event described in NYT [April 13, 1913 -- query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9900E4DB173FE633A... ] as: HUNTER AND PONY RACES.; Rockaway Hunting Club's Plans for One-Day Meeting April 26. The event was to be at Hewlett Bay Park, Long Island.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rockaway_Hunt_Club
